meanings.definition: Not belonging to or associated with a labor union.
meanings.sent1: She preferred working in a nonunion environment.
meanings.sent2: The company hired nonunion workers for the project.
meanings.sent3: The nonunion team decided to form their own group.
meanings.sent4: Her independent spirit made her a nonunion advocate.
meanings.sent5: The nonunion status allowed for more flexibility in negotiations.

meanings.definition: Failure of a broken bone to heal.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a nonunion in his leg.
meanings.sent2: After the accident, he experienced nonunion in his arm.
meanings.sent3: The nonunion of the bone led to additional medical procedures.
meanings.sent4: The nonunion caused prolonged discomfort for the patient.
meanings.sent5: The nonunion required specialized treatment to promote healing.
